channel.title: Outcomes on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in Outcomes on Open Security Summit

item.description: This document includes headings you may use to describe your session outcomes. Rearrange the headings as necessary to ensure coherence and clarity. Please use any additional headings that will improve the outcomes. NOTE: The italic text in this page/document is used for explanation only. Replace it with other useful content. Outcomes/Deliverables (recommend) The outcomes are the results produced from a session regardless of the session type. These can be: Diagrams Documents or Books Playbooks Roadmaps (for next meeting) Wiki pages (namely on owasp.
This is the folder for storing presentation slides from the organisers.

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop Cocktail Party - Ask us anything ( AUA )
OWASP Juice Shop Deep Dive - Integration
item.description: References (recommend) Session page : https://open-security-summit.org/tracks/owasp-juiceshop/owasp-juice-shop-deep-dive-integration/ Additional/External References Integration appendix of the Pwning OWASP Juice Shop guide: https://pwning.owasp-juice.shop/appendix/integration.html

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop Deep Dive - Theming
item.description: Outcomes/Deliverables (recommend) OpenSecuritySummit Store configuration file for OWASP Juice Shop that transforms the UI and product inventory into an OSS2020 merchandise store Configuration files for each of the 17 theming increments as shown by Bjoern during the session References (recommend) Session page : https://open-security-summit.org/tracks/owasp-juiceshop/owasp-juiceshop-deep-dive-theming/ Additional/External References Customization chapter of the Pwning OWASP Juice Shop guide: https://pwning.owasp-juice.shop/part1/customization.html
